title: Islamic consensus of the second coming of Isa alaihyssalam (Christ) - Assim al hakeem
transcript: uh the islamic understanding of the second return of isab na marian peace be upon him this is a well-known fact that all muslims believe it's the consensus of a sunnah it's mentioned in the quran it is mentioned in tens of authentic hadiths of the prophet so there is no dispute he will come and he will reign and he will implement the sharia of the prophet of islam and he will kill the antichrist at the jail and allah would make that time a prosperous time you
